mapper.select: SELECT SUM(inqCount) AS inqCount, SUM(inqAmount) AS inqAmount, SUM(quoteCount) AS quoteCount, SUM(quoteAmount) AS quoteAmount, datetime FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS inqCount, SUM(ifnull(t2.total_quote_price,0)) AS inqAmount, 0 AS quoteCount, 0 AS quoteAmount, FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(t3.log_create_at)) AS datetime FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1, erui_rfq.final_quote t2, ( SELECT inquiry_id as log_inquiry_id,max(into_at) as log_create_at FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log where in_node = 'BIZ_DISPATCHING' group by inquiry_id ) as t3 WHERE t1.id = t2.inquiry_id AND t1.id = t3.log_inquiry_id AND t3.log_create_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.`status` != 'DRAFT' GROUP BY TO_DAYS(t3.log_create_at) UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS inqCount, 0 AS inqAmount, COUNT(1) AS quoteCount, SUM(ifnull(t2.total_quote_price,0)) AS quoteAmount, FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(t3.log_create_at)) AS datetime FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1, erui_rfq.final_quote t2, ( SELECT inquiry_id as log_inquiry_id,max(into_at) as log_create_at FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log where in_node = 'MARKET_CONFIRMING' group by inquiry_id ) as t3 WHERE t1.id = t2.inquiry_id AND t2.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.`status` != 'DRAFT' AND t3.log_inquiry_id = t1.id AND t3.log_create_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") GROUP BY TO_DAYS(t3.log_create_at)) AS t GROUP BY datetime

SELECT count(DISTINCT(member.employee_id)) as employeeCount ,areasCh.name as area FROM erui_sys.country_member AS member LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country AS areasBn on member.country_bn=areasBn.country_bn LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area AS areasCh ON areasBn.market_area_bn=areasCh.bn AND areasCh.lang='zh' GROUP BY area HAVING area IS NOT NULL;
